title: New details emerge about the relationship between an Alabama inmate and corrections officer as search continues - CNN
content:
1. New details emerge about the relationship between an Alabama inmate and corrections officer as search continues  CNN
  2. Guard Who Fled With Murder Inmate Was Cashed Up and Eyeing Florida, Family Says  The Daily Beast
  3. Video shows Alabama jail official reportedly help a capital murder suspect escape  KHOU 11
  4. Alabama sheriff releases jailhouse surveillance video showing murder suspect leave with corrections officer  Fox News
  5. Search intensifies for fugitive Alabama inmate and corrections officer  CBS Mornings
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: As the search continues for a fugitive inmate and the Alabama corrections officer who allegedly helped him escape, new details are emerging about the pair's relationship and the officer's apparent preparations for their getaway.
